A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Like Mark Hamil said\, I fundementally disagreed with everything Rian Johnson had in store for Luke. TLJ disrespected the original trilogy. The characters all felt \"out of character\". Luke's treatment was particularly cruel and unjust. The film created many plot holes raised more questions than answers. For the Star Wars fan\, this was a hard movie to take in. It felt like the fans were being disrespected. The movie itself wasn't bad. If you are a casual fan or just wanna see a good movie\, this is the movie for you. But for the die hard fan\, this was a huge disappointment that really destroyed the legacy that The Return of The Jedi left. As a die hard fan\, I was very sad and unimpressed with the direction that Rian Johnson went.
